content: these crocheted sweaters look great worked up in bernat softee baby with this yarn s light sheen and beautiful color selection these sweaters are sure to be keepsakes this crochet pattern works up quickly using double_crochet and half_double_crochet stitches in a simple top down construction meaning there are no seams to sew and less ends to weave in to fit chest measurement 6 mos 17 43 cm 12 mos 18 45 5 cm 18 mos 19 48 cm 24 mos 20 51 cm finished chest measurement 6 mos 19½ 49 5 cm 12 mos 21½ 54 5 cm 18 mos 23½ 59 5 cm 24 mos 25½ 65 cm 2 buttons for eyes kitty version only small amount of dark pink worsted weight yarn for nose and mouth embroidery
